content: umed during a flight or a specific period of flight, in kilograms. | | alternateFuel | `'number'` | The amount of additional fuel carried by an aircraft to reach and potentially hold at alternate airports in case it cannot land at the primary destination due to unforeseen circumstances, in kilograms. | | alternateFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the amount of additional fuel carried by an aircraft to reach and potentially hold at alternate airports in case it cannot land at the primary destination due to unforeseen circumstances in hours, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format. | | finalReserveFuel | `'number'` | The minimum amount of fuel required to be carried onboard an aircraft upon landing at the destination airport, in kilograms. | | finalReserveFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the minimum amount of fuel required to be carried onboard an aircraft upon landing at the destination airport in hours, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format. | | status | `'string'` | Status of the alternative airport. ACTIVE or CANCELLED.| | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information. | # Flight Plan Runway Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | legId | `'string'` | Flight leg identifier. | | stationIataCode | `'string'` | Station IATA code. | | stationIcaoCode | `'string'` | Station ICAO code. | | runway | `'string'` | Runway of the station. | | type | `'string'` | Type of the runway. Departure Runway, Arrival Runway, Alternative Arrival Runway, Primary Alternative Arrival Runway. | | status | `'string'` | Status of the runway.
